MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY22 postcode area of Llanfyllin, affecting properties in Bwlch Y Cibau. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to rectify a fault on the overhead lines. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.25am on 12th of Nov 2020.
